items.name: Elixir of Eternal Wakefulness
items.description: Rich, spiced coffee with a touch of energizing magic.

items.name: Twilight Herbal Tonic
items.description: A calming blend of moonflower petals, enchanted honey, and elderberry.

items.name: Starry Night Cider
items.description: Warm apple cider infused with cinnamon and a sprinkle of stardust

items.name: Faerie Frost Fizz
items.description: A sparkling lavender and elderflower lemonade with a cooling charm

items.name: Moonberry Nectar
items.description: A deep purple blend of enchanted berries with a hint of citrus.

items.name: Gilded Goblet
items.description: Golden-hued spiced mead that shimmers in candlelight.

items.name: Mystic Hearthbread
items.description: Freshly baked rolls infused with rosemary and served with glowing herb butter.

items.name: Witch’s Cauldron Soup
items.description: A creamy pumpkin and sage bisque, topped with toasted spell-seeds.

items.name: Pixie Puff Pastries
items.description: Delicate, flaky pastries filled with enchanted cheese and forest mushrooms.

items.name: Moonlit Brie & Berries
items.description: Soft, warm brie paired with enchanted berries and honeyed walnuts.

items.name: Phoenix Ember Stew
items.description: A fiery blend of root vegetables, smoked meats, and ember-kissed spices.

items.name: Eldermyst Forest Pie
items.description: Flaky pastry filled with wild mushrooms, enchanted herbs, and aged cheese.

items.name: Hearthstone Roast
items.description: Slow-cooked venison with rosemary, juniper berries, and a whisper of woodland magic.

items.name: Seafarer’s Spellfish
items.description: Grilled river trout glazed with a citrus-ginger enchantment.

items.name: Sorcerer’s Garden Platter
items.description: A vibrant medley of roasted seasonal vegetables, drizzled with moonflower oil.

items.name: Moonlit Truffle Pie
items.description: Dark chocolate and enchanted berries wrapped in a buttery crust.

items.name: Sweet Sin Apple Tart
items.description: Caramelized orchard apples with a hint of cinnamon and vanilla.

items.name: Faerie Light Pudding
items.description: A delicate lavender and honey custard that shimmers under candlelight.

items.name: Elderflower & Stardust Cake
items.description: A soft sponge cake infused with elderflower and a sprinkle of edible stardust.
